title: Idyllic Family Getaway on the Banks of the Murray River
description: Located a stone’s throw from Echuca and Moama, the Winbi River Resort is the perfect destination for a relaxing country getaway with your loved ones. Make this your home base as you enjoy scenic bush walks, visit wineries, see Murray river attractions and more. Fully self-contained units give you freedom while you enjoy a complimentary tea or coffee at Beechworth Bakery, see the area with a 20% discount at Murray River Paddlesteamers and make the most of your stay with a guaranteed 12pm late checkout.

title: Relaxing Stay on the Murray River with Bottle of Wine & Cheese Platter
description: Listen for the sound of birds and the rustling of gum trees as you follow the Mighty Murray River and make your way to the Golden River Motor Inn. At this cosy motel, you’ll have everything you need for a relaxing getaway in the town of Moama, located in the heart of the Murray River Region. Get away from it all and embrace a more laidback lifestyle in this gorgeous country town with continental breakfast hamper, a welcome bottle of wine and local cheese, meat and olives platter and a guaranteed 12pm late check out all included.

title: Idyllic Family Getaway on the Banks of the Murray River
description: Located a stone’s throw from Echuca and Moama, the Winbi River Resort has its own private beach, boat ramp, tennis court, BMX track, basketball court and games room, plus two swimming pools with heated spas! It's the perfect base to enjoy scenic bush walks, visit wineries, see Murray river attractions and more. Fully self-contained units give you freedom, while a late checkout of 2pm (subject to availability) allows for a leisurely morning on your day of departure.
